00053     [Obsolete("Please use Interpolation instead. This class is obsolete and will be removed in future versions.")]
00054     public class InterpolationSingleDimension
00055     {
00056         SampleList _samples;
00057         IInterpolationAlgorithm _algorithm;
00058         bool _dirty = true; // delay preparation until first evaluation

00069         public
00070         InterpolationSingleDimension(
00071             SampleList samples
00072             )
00073         {
00074             _samples = samples;
00075             _samples.SampleAltered += samples_SampleAltered;
00076             _algorithm = new PolynomialInterpolationAlgorithm(); 
00077         }
00078 
00087         public
00088         InterpolationSingleDimension(
00089             double[] t,
00090             double[] x
00091             )
00092         {
00093             _samples = new SampleList(t, x);
00094             _algorithm = new PolynomialInterpolationAlgorithm();
00095         }

00106             IDictionary samples

00111         }

00218 
00223         protected virtual
00224         IInterpolationAlgorithm
00225         SelectAlgorithm(
00226             InterpolationMode mode
00227             )
00228         {
00229             switch(mode)
00230             {
00231                 case InterpolationMode.ExpectNoPoles:
00232                     return new PolynomialInterpolationAlgorithm();
00233                 case InterpolationMode.ExpectPoles:
00234                     return new RationalInterpolationAlgorithm();
00235                 case InterpolationMode.Smooth:
00236                     throw new NotImplementedException();
00237                 default:
00238                     return new PolynomialInterpolationAlgorithm();
00239             }
00240         }
00241 
00242         #endregion
00243 
00247         public
00248         double
00249         Evaluate(
00250             double t
00251             )
00252         {
00253             if(_dirty)
00254             {
00255                 _algorithm.Prepare(_samples);
00256                 _dirty = false;
00257             }
00258 
00259             if(_samples.MinT <= t && t <= _samples.MaxT)
00260             {
00261                 return _algorithm.Interpolate(t);
00262             }
00263 
00264             return _algorithm.Extrapolate(t);
00265         }
00266 
00270         public
00271         double
00272         Evaluate(
00273             double t,
00274             out double errorEstimation
00275             )
00276         {
00277             if(_dirty)
00278             {
00279                 _algorithm.Prepare(_samples);
00280                 _dirty = false;
00281             }
00282 
00283             return _algorithm.Interpolate(t, out errorEstimation);
00284         }
00285 
00289         public bool SupportErrorEstimation
00290         {
00291             get { return _algorithm.SupportErrorEstimation; }
00292         }
00293 
00294         void
00295         samples_SampleAltered(
00296             object sender,
00297             SampleList.SampleAlteredEventArgs e
00298             )
00299         {
00300             _dirty = true; // require new preparation
00301         }
00302     }
